评论概述: An Homage to Rolex: Delightful and Accurate
评论详情: This is an homage to the Rolex Celebration that you can get used for $10,000 - $20,000 dollars in an automatic format. This is quartz and more accurate. The bracelet does not pinch and is oh so comfortable. It's not a counterfeit, saying clearly AKNight on the front, not a fake Rolex, but a fun homage with a wink to those who pay as much for a watch as for a used car. Beautiful and reliable.

I have a Breitling dive watch with an orange face that was THE go to watch. but I will give the ($5k plus Breitling) a break and save it for dining out or a casual day. But mostly wear this $40ish watch for everything a retiree wants from a watch. good looking, simple and illuminates. Great choice for a cheap knock around that will run forever like a timex. Nice looking, decent sized square shaped watches are not as easy to find as one would think. Square watches tend to wear (look) bigger than a standard round case. (And watches always look bigger in wrist-shot-photographs, so this photo is making the watch appear to be much larger than it is.) I have a few other Aknight watches and they look good and have held up nicely, so I was very happy to see this option now in their lineup. Thankfully, I was just as happy upon receipt. The watch looks even better in person, was very easy to size (it comes with a pin remover, which is very helpful, should you not already have one on hand), and is very comfortable to wear. The corners are, thankfully, rounded a bit more than they look in the photos, so it looks a bit more up to date and stylish than it might have had the corners been sharp and pointed. My only complaint is that there is no date complication and no seconds markers, but that's really just a personal preference. Overall, it's a very nice watch, especially for the price.

I was a little surprised by the weight of this watch when I got it out of the box, but it doesn't feel heavy on my wrist. I like the way the dial looks and it was easy enough with the tool included to remove the links to size it correctly. The date number could be bigger and a light or glow in the dark paint on the hands and dial would be a great addition.

I rarely write reviews but this is not a bad watch!  The dial has a really nice color. The hour markers shine when the light hits it and it’s very easy to read. You can’t hear it tick which is what I love the most.  The dial size isn’t big at all so it can be worn with those with small wrists. The metal band flows well with the head of the watch but you can always switch it out for anything that you like.  Obviously to a watch enthusiast, this is a throwaway watch but unless you’re speaking with someone who really cares about the inner workings of a watch (which is rarely anybody) it’s then a great complimentary piece that you can wear.  Simply put, if you need a watch that looks nice, and works, this is the one for you. Don’t care about those who think Quartz watches are garbage. They’re not. They’re great and accurate. And above all, wear what YOU like!

For 30 bucks I wasn't expecting much, but was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. The face is a nice light blue, it's different. Its lts comfortable on the wrist. Standard Japanese movement, hopefully the battery lasts well. I'm very satisfied with this purchase so far, maybe I'll update if it breaks within a month, but for first impressions, it's great.

评论用户: Down Home Hip to the Jive
评论概述: Show Me The Money As In Savings
评论详情: The purchase of this inexpensive good looking watch is a twofold winner:  the watch itself looks more expensive than its price and the money not spent on a more expensive watch means you have more cash in your wallet.  The only negative is the watch band which does not have a micro adjustment feature so its fit is less than likely to be perfect.  Otherwise the watch is favorably priced as a fashion statement so the manufacturer should sell a boatful.  Purchase the OP blue and it looks fabulous.

评论概述: There’s only one reason to buy this watch…
评论详情: So I’ve been dying to try a “Tiffany” blue watch, but I’m ballin’ on a budget. So I looked around and found this little guy for $30. I took a shot, and I’m glad I did. I mean, at this price point, there’s really only one reason to buy it… that turquoise dial! And it’s a really good looking dial! The color really pops.  But there are a couple of pleasant surprises too. Applied indexes and logo, a nice looking hand set, a framed date window, and the logo is used as the second hand counterbalance. All really good stuff! On mine, the second hand even hits all the minute marks. Now, obviously there’s some cost cutting going on here. Plated alloy case, low grade mineral crystal, and a horrible bracelet (I had to deduct a star for that bracelet). I just took the bracelet off and threw a cheap steel mesh one on. It looks fantastic! I think it would look great on a light grey silicone strap too. I think I’ll try it.  So if you’re looking for a nice looking watch at a great price, this is one to consider. Especially if you just want to try a different color to see how you feel about it. The price is unbeatable, and the watch really does look more expensive than it is!

Pretty watch at a great price. How long will the battery hold? Who knows. Hopefully through the summer. This has a link bracelet, so be careful to factor in the extra $* bucks or so to get it adjusted, unless you have a giant wrist, or know how to fix watch straps. Overall - I am pleased!

I’ve been seeing Tiffany blue watches and they’ve really grown on me. I don’t think it’s a color I will wear very often so I didn’t want to spend a lot of money. The watch arrived well packaged and included a tool to adjust the band. I have an 8 inch wrist and had to take out three links to make it comfortable. This watch has a comforting weight to it. The case is highly polished and the bracelet is brushed. The face is handsome and more finished than I expected at this price point. The bracelet is not premium but perfectly acceptable. Overall I’m very impressed with this watch and I’m very happy with my purchase. I may have to buy the pink one just for fun.UPDATE:  I decided to put a strap on this watch for a while.  When I took the bracelet off, I discovered that it has solid end links!  I looked closer and saw that the links are solid too.  It still uses pins for adjustment, the clasp is stamped, and it doesn't have any micro-adjustment, but the construction is quite solid.  The more I wear this watch, the more I like it!

Not perfect, or course, but a steal at this price. Top finishes on all of the visible areas, where you want it to be. A bit light, sounds a bit hollow, but still worthy of five stars, it looks far more expensive than it is. I have 177 watches, and I am pleased with this purchase, and am happy to wear it.

Now I know this model comes in several colors, so I should note that I am referring to the light blue dial. The price is amazing. Now I did swap out the bracelet for a jubilee because I think it softens the look a little. I paid about $25 for that. So I'm all in for about $55. 评论概述: NOT Automatic, NOT Self-Winding, NOT even Mechanical... but a decent quartz watch
评论详情: When I bought this, it was described as an Automatic, Self-Winding Mechanical watch. When I received it, I could not hear the self-winding mechanism operate. It is not automatic, self-winding, or even mechanical; it is a quartz watch.  I returned it because I wanted an automatic watch, not a quartz watch.

It is a pretty Tiffany blue faced watch.  Well packaged and quick shipping.  It is a fashion watch with a polished body.  The bracelet is brushed.  It comes with a tool to resize the cheap bracelet, but there are no microadjustments. The one I received had a fleabite, but for the price I can live with it. This quartz watch is not particularly waterproof, so be careful.  There is lume on the indices and hands, but it is weak. The crown is a good size.Overall, I am pleased with my purchase.  I may change the cheap bracelet for a good leather strap.
EL ESTILO SE VE BASTANTE VIEN
